DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety and efficacy of MD-15 intraocular lens implanted into the aphakic eyes
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assessing Safety and Efficacy of MD-15 Intraocular Lens in Patients With Aphakic Eye After Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients who intend to undergo phacoemulsification cataract extraction Patients who undergo secondary implantation Patients with vision loss induced by causes other than cataract Patients who the principal investigator/subinvestigator considers ineligible for enrollment
